meta.name: It's Florida, Man
meta.description: This irreverent late-night comedy series brings to life unbelievable ripped-from-the-headlines tales of the Sunshine State - straight from the people who live there. Featuring interviews from everyday Floridians and playful recreations starring a rotating cast of actors and comedians, including Anna Faris, Jake Johnson, Randall Park, Juliette Lewis, Sam Richardson, Ego Nwodim and more, this hilarious and outrageous series sheds light on the viral, wacky and weird. Covering diverse topics - from mermaids to witches, extreme fantasies and feral bunnies with equal parts humor and heart, IT'S FLORIDA, MAN is a love letter to the beaches, backwaters, and especially the people of a misunderstood yet magical state.

videos.title: Cuckoo Girl
videos.overview: A Naples woman succumbs to the effects of a new medication and finds herself in trouble with the law. Guest appearances: Edi Patterson, Tiffany Haddish, and Swoosie Kurtz.

videos.title: Cuckoo Girl
videos.overview: A Naples woman succumbs to the effects of a new medication and finds herself in trouble with the law. Guest appearances: Edi Patterson, Tiffany Haddish, and Swoosie Kurtz.

videos.title: Bigfoot
videos.overview: Seeking a social outlet, a Sarasota man heads to the Everglades with a new friend on a search for the elusive Skunk Ape. Guest appearances: Haley Joel Osment and Milan Carter.

videos.title: Moonshine
videos.overview: An opportunist attempts to make a quick buck as a moonshiner, but a wrong turn pits him against another illegal backwoods operation. Guest appearances: Nick Thune, Johnny Knoxville, and Ryan Mirvis.

videos.title: Crushed
videos.overview: After traveling to Orlando to meet her online goth prince, a sheltered Jacksonville girl narrowly survives a chilling mishap. Guest appearances: Holmes, Joel Kim Booster, Frankie Quiñones, Ping Wu, Taika Waititi, and Rita Ora.

videos.title: Pizza Man
videos.overview: After a night of hard partying, a Pensacola man finds himself nearly naked in a chain pizza establishment.

videos.title: Toes
videos.overview: Desperate to earn some cash to see his favorite artist in concert, a music fan takes to the internet to pick up odd jobs, but soon finds the oddest job of all helping to fulfill an Orlando man's extreme fantasy.

videos.title: Gator
videos.overview: A Myakka City man's search for meaning ends in a bloody tussle with an alligator, leading to a desperate, three-day fight to survive in swampy Florida conditions.

videos.title: Mermaids
videos.overview: When a former coworker – and practicing witch – moves in next door, an aquatic performer finds herself pitted against dark forces while dealing with an increasingly disturbing pattern of behavior that began when they worked together as mermaids at a Fort Lauderdale bar.

videos.title: Saucy
videos.overview: A messy breakup triggers a Deland man to target his ex-boyfriend in a marinara-fueled act of revenge.

videos.title: Bunnies
videos.overview: On Jenada Isle, an out-of-control population of abandoned bunnies and the ensuing onslaught of rogue rabbit rescuers wreak havoc on an otherwise quiet community – leading to mounting ethical concerns amid the chaos.

videos.title: Mugshot
videos.overview: After getting featured in a controversial online police program, a Pensacola man with a penchant for high-speed chases goes viral for his unique features.

videos.title: Speedy
videos.overview: When the state of Florida takes possession of his dog, a seasoned criminal seeking revenge plots to steal an entire casino boat.
